author: julianfoad
msg: Fix an efficiency bug by simplifying the code.  A lock token processing
function in RA-Neon was trying to avoid having to re-allocate a string
buffer, but, due to a typo in verbose #define statements, was always under-
estimating the required size (by 5 bytes per lock) and so could end up
terms of SVN_LOCK_CLOSE but should have been in terms of
SVN_LOCK_PATH_CLOSE) and instead factor out the sizeof() operator.
Assert that the final length does in fact match the calculated length.

author: jim
msg: Handle cases, esp when using mod_proxy_fcgi, when we do not
want SCRIPT_FILENAME to include the query string.

author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-2410 : Problems with paths ending with .jsp in WebSphere

msg: Add support for ECDSA for signature creation and verification
